official_title: To establish a Commission on health policy for employer-sponsored health plans.
short_title: Health Care Access, Affordability, and Quality Advisory Commission Act of 1999

summary.text: Health Care Access, Affordability, and Quality Advisory Commission Act of 1999 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to establish the Health Care Access, Affordability, and Quality Commission to establish model guidelines in: (1) independent expert external review programs; (2) consumer friendly information programs; (3) systems for measuring patient satisfaction and patient outcomes; and (4) systems to ensure the timely processing of claims.Authorizes appropriations.
